excerpt: "Shifting from the traditional QA role, analysts can morph into customer or AI analysts, creating an intelligence offering that is rich in insights beyond agent performance and satisfaction. They can become instrumental in enhancing product usability, refining marketing language and advising teams on unexplored pain points or use cases."
